scenario_1.calculation_notes: Base 1040 fee $175. Time cost: 2.5 h × $125 = $312.50. First-time client multiplier 1.15 → $312.50 × 1.15 = $359.38. Complexity adjustment = $46.88. Time-charge = $359.38 − $175 = $184.38. Added Schedule A ($50) + Schedule B ($35) = $85. Total = $175 + $184.38 + $85 = $444.38.

scenario_2.calculation_notes: Base 1120S fee $650. Time cost: 4 h × $125 = $500. Prior-year amendment multiplier 1.25 → $625.00. Complexity add = $125. Since $625 − base $650 = −$25, time-charge set to $0 per rules. Forms: 3 K-1s ($225) + Form 4562 ($85) = $310. Final fee: $650 + $0 + $310 = $960.

scenario_4.calculation_notes: Base 1065 fee $550. Time: 5.5 h × $125 = $687.50. Complex asset dispositions multiplier 1.35 → $928.13. Complexity add $240.63. Time-charge: $928.13 − $550 = $378.13. Forms: 5 K-1s ($375) + Form 4797 ($95) = $470. Final fee: $550 + $378.13 + $470 = $1,398.13.

scenario_5.calculation_notes: Base 1040 fee $175. Time: 3.5 h × $125 = $437.50. Foreign income multiplier 1.30 → $568.75. Complexity add $131.25. Time-charge: $568.75 − $175 = $393.75. Forms: Sch D ($75) + Sch E 3 properties ($300) = $375. Total fee = $175 + $393.75 + $375 = $943.75.
